metadata.title: Base64 Toolbox
metadata.description: Professional collection of Base64 online tools, supporting bidirectional conversion between various formats (text, image, PDF, JSON, XML, Excel, Hex) and Base64. Secure, fast, and free Base64 encoding/decoding tools.
metadata.keywords: base64, converter, encoder, decoder, toolbox, base64 conversion, online tools, text to base64, image to base64, pdf to base64, json to base64, xml to base64, excel to base64, hex to base64

HomePage.title: Base64 Toolbox
HomePage.description: Professional collection of Base64 online conversion tools, supporting bidirectional conversion between multiple formats and Base64, protecting your data privacy and security.
